external_references.description: Ta, V., et al. (2022, August 8). FIN13: A Cybercriminal Threat Actor Focused on Mexico. Retrieved February 9, 2023.

description: [FIN13](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1016) has used scheduled tasks names such as `acrotyr` and `AppServicesr` to mimic the same names in a compromised network's `C:\Windows` directory.(Citation: Mandiant FIN13 Aug 2022)
